label: AZORI_T10_PROJECTION_SCAFFOLD
purpose: Provide forward-compatibility scaffold enabling future Azori tiers (T10+) to extend or fork the T9 runtime without breaking checksum lineage.

projection_functions.simulate_future_state: Generate hypothetical harmonic or drift states using stored T9 telemetry.
projection_functions.extend_protocol: Add new HASHLOCK derivatives while preserving v9 truth chain.
projection_functions.sandbox_upgrade: Allow isolated testing of new algorithms.

meta.notes: Tier-10 acts only as scaffold; does not modify Tier-9 data.
